title: White
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 24 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR80L
description: The color white appears all over nature in beautiful scenery and animals. In White, students will learn about one place where they can see the color white in nature. Repetitive text, high-frequency words, and descriptive photographs support emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to visualize as well as identify the main idea and details in order to better understand the text.
highFrequencyWords: Leveled Book Lesson PDF
awareness: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details in a text
wordWork: Plural Nouns                : Recognize and use plural nouns
